thought: The website is accessible. Now I need to extract text and hyperlinks to analyze the content.
observation: Trusted Home Heating & Propane Supplier in Ontario | Sparlings Propane | Sparlings Propane  Your propane company since 1951. Search Open an Account Order Propane Client Space For Home For Business Locations About Us Contact HOME EXPLORE + Open Residential Account Business Explore + Open Commercial Account Refer Your Friends When they open an AUTO delivery home heating account with us, you get a $100 credit on account* LEARN MORE Carbon Offset Your one-stop supplier for fuel and carbon offsets Learn More Delivering Solutions For bulk diesel fuel, YOUR PROPANE COMPANY SINCE 1951 Sparlings has been keeping your family comfortable at home and work since 1951. Along with the supply of propane, we provide expert sales and installation of propane appliances. The smart, local choice. ORDER PROPANE Ordering fuel online and having it delivered right to your home has never been easier. ORDER NOW COMMITTED TO CUSTOMER CARE At Sparlings, customer care is about YOU - because you deserve quick, reliable services and an exceptional customer experience. It’s our promise to you. CONTACT CUSTOMER CARE DEDICATED TO HEALTH, SAFETY AND ENVIRONMENT Parkland Corporation's goal is to be the industry leader in managing the health, safety and environmental (HSE) risks associated with the transportation, delivery and handling of petroleum products. All rights reserved.
